Blessings Written February 26, 2022This response is the subjective opinion of the management representative and not of Tripadvisor LLC.Visited September 2021Traveled soloWritten February 26, such a gift!Where to begin? Reya is such a bright light; you immediately feel her warm, inviting energy as soon as you meet her. My friend and I did air yoga and reiki with her, and we both had such amazing experiences! Air yoga was a great way to slow down, decompress, and stretch after being active in La Fortuna for a couple of days. It was our first time doing reiki too which left me feeling at peace and so moved; she is truly gifted. I also ended up doing a tarot reading which emphasized and built upon what we talked about during our reiki session. The messages received were very relevant and meaningful to me at this point in my life. I highly recommend seeing Reya if you're ever in La Fortuna! I promise you won't be disappointed. It was like visiting an old friend who brings nothing but love, support, and guidance. Thank you again, Reya!It was an honor to hold space and create an experience so you can connect deeper to yourself! Keep trusting life and what it has for you. Stay connected to your power and intuition.
